forgot_password.title: Forgot Password?
forgot_password.email_not_present: Email address %{email} is not associated to any account
forgot_password.email_sent: An email have been sent to given address with further instructions

mail.title: Password change request
mail.heading: You are receiving this email because you have requested to modify the password for your account
mail.link_text: Please click the following link or copy and paste on your browser's address bar to modify your password
mail.ignore_if_not_requested: If you don't have requested to change your password, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged

modified.title: Password successfully modified
modified.text: You Password have been successfully modified

mail.title: Password successfully modified
mail.text: You Password have been successfully modified
